titleStmt.title: Great and good news for the Church of England, if they please to accept thereof: or The latitudinarian Christians most humble address and advice to all the imposing clergy men of the said Church by what names or titles soever dignified or distinguished. With allowance, May the 28th 1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. L. and I. K.,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured from Wing G1654.
Date of publication from line below title.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
